title: Ep. 227: Kim Kardashian West & Allison Statter on Friendship and their New Beauty Collection
itunes:title: Ep. 227: Kim Kardashian West & Allison Statter on Friendship and their New Beauty Collection
itunes:subtitle: In this intimate conversation with Kim Kardashian West and Allison Statter, the best friends discuss their relationship and their new KKW Beauty collection. On the agenda: early memories of Kim’s dad; the secret pager codes they used in high school; th...
description:
In this intimate conversation with Kim Kardashian West and Allison Statter, the best friends discuss their relationship and their new KKW Beauty collection. On the agenda: early memories of Kim’s dad; the secret pager codes they used in high school; the struggle to balance work and motherhood (and law school!); and their fascination with Marilyn Monroe and Princess Diana. Listen in for beauty tips, friendship advice—and deep thoughts on Crocs, Madonna, and the best MAC lip pencil. No topic is off limits! -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
